column4: While screwing around with my sound, I somehow managed to uninstall the "Sound Settings" system panel.  How do I get it back?  My sound used to work.  Now it does not
do you mean that its just not there in the menu but its there on the panel?
to restore it on the panel run gnome-volume-control-applet, to restore it in the menus, just right click on a menu and go to edit menus
